keyMoments.title: The Crew Loses Their Memories
keyMoments.description: All Straw Hat Pirates except Robin have their memories stolen by Noko, causing them to forget they are a crew and reverting to their pre-crew personalities.
keyMoments.significance: The crew faces its first complete breakdown as members no longer recognize each other or their bonds. This tests the strength of their relationships and shows how much they've grown together.

keyMoments.title: The Crew Scatters
keyMoments.description: Unable to convince the memory-less crew of their bonds, Robin watches as the Straw Hat Pirates split apart, with Nami fleeing with treasure and Zoro swimming away.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's unity is completely shattered, setting up the challenge of reuniting and restoring their memories in the following episodes.

ships.description: The crew's ship, which they no longer recognize after losing their memories.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
